Name: Coconut Bread
Description: A soft bread with coconut and cheese filling, topped with sliced cashew.

Name: Garlic Cheese
Description: A soft bread topped with special garlic spread, mozzarella cheese, and sprinkled with chopped chives.

Name: Coffee Bread
Description: A coffee flavored bread filled with special cream cheese.

Name: Whole Milk Bread
Description: A soft, moist Japanese style bread with buttery and milky flavor.

Name: Berry Fairy
Description: Sweet bread with fresh strawberry and special cream.

Name: Blueberry Cheesecake
Description: Moist and rich cheesecake with blueberry jam based with a cookie crumble bottom.

Name: Black Forest Slice
Description: Chocolate sponge cake with sweet cherries and fresh cream.

Name: Coconut Roll
Description: Vanilla flavored sponge roll filled with fresh vanilla cream and surrounded by coconut shavings.

Name: Chocolate Roll
Description: Chocolate flavored sponge roll with fresh cream.

Name: Caramel Macchiato
Description: Espresso with steamed milk and caramel sauce.

Name: Boba Milk Tea
Description: Black tea with fresh milk, cream and boba.

Name: Iced Fruit Tea
Description: Jasmine green tea with fresh peach pulp.

Name: Butter Bread
Description: Golden bread baked with salted butter. Sprinkled with sea salt to make it simply delicious.

Name: Red Velvet Slice
Description: 3-layered red velvet cake with vanilla cream cheese and red velvet crumbs. Decorated with white chocolate shavings and cherries.

Name: Taro Taro
Description: Sweet bread made with mixed grains and filled with signature taro filling.

Name: Iced Coffee
Description: Iced Sweetened Americano with sea salt cream.
